fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Combust: When you die, choose to privately deal 2 HP of unblockable damage to a target at the end of the phase. Must be chosen by the following phase of your death.
- Recharge: If you hold no attacking cards (excluding satcheled), draw a guaranteed attacking card at the end of the phase.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Double Strike: Pick a non-special attacking card in your hand. Double it (without modifiers) and send both toward a single player of your choice. [2 uses, 2 CD]
- Transmute: Change a card in your hand into a non-special attacking card of your choice. [2 uses, 2 CD]
- Summon: Draw a card. [3 uses]
